name: Faded Under Eye Brightening & Clearing Eye Masks
about: What it is:A pair of cooling hydrogel under eye masks that fade the look of dark circles and discoloration so you can kick back and let your worries fade away..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dullness, Dark Circles, Puffiness.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Caffeine: Helps lessen the appearance of dark circles and invigorates the under-eye..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:These visibly brightening and soothing under-eye masks are enriched with gentle yet effective actives that depuff and hydrate the under-eye.
ingredients: -Caffeine: Helps lessen the appearance of dark circles and invigorates the under-eye..-Kojic Acid: Antioxidant that helps even skin tone and reduce appearance of dark spots..-Arbutin: A plant extract that helps fade the look of excess pigmentation...Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Polyacrylic Acid, Agar, Niacinamide, Sodium Polyacrylate, Tranexamic Acid, Kojic Acid, Arbutin, Alpha-Arbutin, Caffeine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glutathione, Adenosine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Cellulose Gum, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Tartaric Acid, Aluminum Glycinate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside....
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean under-eye area for 15 minutes. Use two to three times a week. .-For stubborn discoloration, follow up with Faded Serum (sold separately). .-For an extra cool treat, refrigerate the patches prior to use. .-To maximize results, apply the mask in reverse. Place the round end near the nose, which is more prone to dark circles and puffiness, or wear the round size towards the temples to address the outer area where dehydration lines can appear.
